00044 namespace flom {
00045     
00050     class FlomException : public exception {
00051         virtual const char* what() const throw()
00052         {
00053             return flom_strerror(ReturnCode);
00054         }
00055 
00056         private:
00060         int ReturnCode;
00061 
00062         public:
00066         FlomException(int ret_cod) {
00067             ReturnCode = ret_cod; }
00071         int getReturnCode() { return ReturnCode; }
00076         string getReturnCodeText() {
00077             return (string(flom_strerror(ReturnCode))); }
00078     };
00079 
00080 
00081 
00085     class FlomHandle {
00086         private:
00090         flom_handle_t handle;
00091 
00092         public:
00093         FlomHandle() {
00094             int ret_cod = flom_handle_init(&handle);
00095             /* in case of error, an exception is thrown */
00096             if (FLOM_RC_OK != ret_cod) {
00097                 syslog(LOG_ERR, "FlomHandle/flom_handle_init: "
00098                        "ret_cod=%d ('%s')\n", ret_cod, flom_strerror(ret_cod));
00099                 throw FlomException(ret_cod);
00100             }
00101         }
00102         ~FlomHandle() {
00103             int ret_cod = flom_handle_clean(&handle);
00104             /* exception can NOT be thrown from a destructor, only syslog
00105                records the issue */
00106             if (FLOM_RC_OK != ret_cod) {
00107                 syslog(LOG_ERR, "~FlomHandle/flom_handle_clean: "
00108                        "ret_cod=%d ('%s')\n", ret_cod, flom_strerror(ret_cod));
00109             }
00110         }
00111 
00118         int lock() { return flom_handle_lock(&handle); }
00119         
00125         int unlock() { return flom_handle_unlock(&handle); }
00126 
00139         const char *getLockedElementAsCStr() {
00140             return flom_handle_get_locked_element(&handle); }
00141         
00154         string getLockedElement() {
00155             return NULL != flom_handle_get_locked_element(&handle) ?
00156                 flom_handle_get_locked_element(&handle) : ""; }
00157         
00166         int getDiscoveryAttempts() {
00167             return flom_handle_get_discovery_attempts(&handle); }
00168 
00178         int setDiscoveryAttempts(int value) {
00179             return flom_handle_set_discovery_attempts(&handle, value); }
00180 
00190         int getDiscoveryTimeout() {
00191             return flom_handle_get_discovery_timeout(&handle); }
00192 
00203         int setDiscoveryTimeout(int value) {
00204             return flom_handle_set_discovery_timeout(&handle, value); }
00205 
00213         int getDiscoveryTtl() {
00214             return flom_handle_get_discovery_ttl(&handle); }
00215 
00225         int setDiscoveryTtl(int value) {
00226             return flom_handle_set_discovery_ttl(&handle, value); }
00227 
00237         flom_lock_mode_t getLockMode() {
00238             return flom_handle_get_lock_mode(&handle); }
00239 
00250         int setLockMode(flom_lock_mode_t value) {
00251             return flom_handle_set_lock_mode(&handle, value); }
00252

00263             return flom_handle_get_multicast_address(&handle); }

00274             return NULL != flom_handle_get_multicast_address(&handle) ?
00275                 flom_handle_get_multicast_address(&handle) : ""; }

00299             flom_handle_set_multicast_address(&handle, value.c_str()); }
